items.title: U.S. warplanes strike three Iranian nuclear sites in sweeping attack
items.description: The bombing is a major escalation by President Donald Trump, tethering the United States to a conflict with no clear end in sight.

items.title: Trump undermines Watergate laws in massive shift of ethics system
items.description: Congress built a system 50 years ago to prevent another Nixon. Trump seems determined to dismantle those rules.
